mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.liuyan_name as liuyanName ,a.liuyan_types as liuyanTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.liuyan_content as liuyanContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_number as yonghuNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.bumen_types as bumenTypes ,yonghu.zhiwu_types as zhiwuTypes ,yonghu.chushengriqi_time as chushengriqiTime ,yonghu.ruzhi_time as ruzhiTime ,yonghu.yonghu_content as yonghuContent
FROM liuyan a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.liuyan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanName},'%')
and a.liuyan_types = #{params.liuyanTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.bumen_types = #{params.bumenTypes}
and yonghu.zhiwu_types = #{params.zhiwuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.chushengriqi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.chushengriqiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.chushengriqi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.chushengriqiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.ruzhi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.ruzhiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.ruzhi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.ruzhiTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
